name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Cloud Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **AWS** services including **EC2**, **S3**, **ECS**, **RDS**, and deployment of **CloudFormation** and **Terraform** infrastructures. Proficient in designing and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and managing **Kubernetes** and **Docker** environments for scalable applications. Strong background in scripting with **Bash**, **Python**, and **PowerShell**, along with expertise in **Ansible** for automation and orchestration.
Adept at monitoring and troubleshooting cloud-native solutions, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Experienced in developing high-performance applications using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, and backend development with **Node.js** and **FastAPI**. Well-versed in building AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing **Machine Learning** tools and frameworks, providing predictive analytics and real-time processing capabilities.
